trans-unit.source: Provides utilities to support the exporting of COM+ SOAP-enabled application proxies by the server and the importing of the proxies by the client.
trans-unit.target: 提供实用工具，支持在启用 COM + SOAP 的应用程序代理服务器和客户端代理的导入的导出。

trans-unit.source: The utility functions that ISoapUtility provides are called from numerous locations within COM+; however, their primary purpose is to support the export and import of client proxies.
trans-unit.target: 从在 COM + 中; 中的多个位置调用 ISoapUtility 提供的实用工具函数但是，它们的主要目的是支持的导出和导入的客户端代理。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.SoapUtility> for the default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.SoapUtility>的默认实现。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.SoapUtility>

trans-unit.source: ISoapUtility is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: ISoapUtility 由.NET Framework 在内部使用。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use it directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: 不需要在代码中直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path for the SOAP virtual root bin directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回 SOAP 虚拟根目录的 bin 目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The root Web server.
trans-unit.target: 根 Web 服务器。

trans-unit.source: The base URL address.
trans-unit.target: 基 URL 地址。

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟根目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, this parameter contains the file path for the SOAP virtual root bin directory.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，此参数将包含 SOAP 虚拟根目录的 bin 目录的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 中的调用链的调用方没有访问非托管的代码的权限。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP utility is not available.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 实用程序不可用。

trans-unit.source: The call to get the system directory failed.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取系统目录的调用失败。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path for the SOAP virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 SOAP 虚拟根目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The root Web server.
trans-unit.target: 根 Web 服务器。

trans-unit.source: The base URL address.
trans-unit.target: 基 URL 地址。

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟根目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, this parameter contains the file path for the SOAP virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，此参数将包含 SOAP 虚拟根目录的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 中的调用链的调用方没有访问非托管的代码的权限。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP utility is not available.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 实用程序不可用。

trans-unit.source: The call to get the system directory failed.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取系统目录的调用失败。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether authenticated, encrypted SOAP interfaces are present.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否经过身份验证，加密的 SOAP 接口存在。

trans-unit.source: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 中的调用链的调用方没有访问非托管的代码的权限。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP utility is not available.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 实用程序不可用。
